artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
description: landscape with two flying cranes, right center; grasses growing in water; nets (?) at left; buildings at left middle ground; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: combined date and censor seal: 戌九改 {inu kyū aratame} (Dog 9 inspected); Carver\'s seal: ホリ長
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Benten Shrine at Haneda
